welcomeToGamGame:
Welcome to the GAM Game!
With this app, you can Create Stories using the artworks in the GAM Collection and see other peopleâ€™s stories.
Click on Collection to access the full list of pieces that are part of the game and explore the stories created by the other users.
You can click on My Stories to browse your stories.
logInDescription: Log in to your InSpice account to create your own content and interact with the museum's artworks.
exploreTheCollectionDescription: Click on an artwork to access its information page and interact with its stories.
searchArtworksByTitleOrAuthor: Search artworks by title or author
scanQrDescription: Use your device's camera to take a picture of the QR code next to any artwork in this activityand select it from here.
createGamGameStoryDescription:
So you've decided to create a new GAM Game Story...
In the next few steps, you will be prompted to select different artworks from the GAM collection (between 2 and 3) and share your thoughts and feelings about them. You can even add your own tags and emojis to the artworks!
Please press BEGIN to start creating your personal story.
selectArtworkDescription: Take a look at the different artworks included in this activity and pick one for your story by clicking on it. You may use the search bar to look for specific artworks by title or author's name.
youreAboutToChooseArtwork: You're about to choose {{artwork}}, by {{author}} - as your next artwork. Continue with this choice?
wouldYouLikeToAddAnAdditionalArtworkToSt: Would you like to add an additional artwork to your story? Or would you rather submit it as it is?
beforeSubmittingYourStory: Before submitting your story, please type a title for it down below.
writeTitleForYourStory: Write a title for your story
similarArtworksDescription: Here are a few artworks that trigger similar emotions from the ones you've selected for your story. You may click on any of them to view more details.
oppositeArtworksDescription: Here are a few artworks that trigger opposite emotions from the ones you've selected for your story. You may click on any of them to view more details.
myStoriesDescription: Here you can find a list of your personal stories. Use this page to browse, view and delete the stories you've already created.
areYouSureYouWantToGoBackToArtworkSelect: Are you sure you want to go back to the artwork selection screen? Your progress in this story part will be lost.
thereWasProblemWhenFetchingArtworkStorie: There was a problem while fetching this artwork's stories.
areYouSureYouWantToExitStoryCreation: Are you sure you wish to exit the story creation mode? Your progress will be lost!
thereWasProblemWhenFetchingRecommendedSt: There was a problem when fetching recommended stories
youAreAboutToDeleteStory:
You are about to delete your story '{{title}}'.
Proceed with this deletion?
